description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Spell Find combines the challenge of a word find with the excitement of fantasy combat.  Find the word ARCHER to summon one to your aid, INFECT to poison your opponent’s minions, or FREEZE to temporarily disable their controls.  Learn more at http://sugarpillstudios.com
